Package org.s1.web

S1-Web application

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplicationFilter
    Base class for you application.
    CharsetEncodingFilter
    Web charset encoding filter
    UTF-8 Example: <filter> <filter-name>CharsetEncodingFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.s1.misc.CharsetEncodingFilter</filter-class> </filter> <filter-mapping> <filter-name>CharsetEncodingFilter</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern> </filter-mapping>
    Or you can define encoding manually: <filter> <filter-name>CharsetEncodingFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.s1.misc.CharsetEncodingFilter</filter-class> <init-param> <param-name>encoding</param-name> <param-value>UTF-8</param-value> </init-param> </filter> <filter-mapping> <filter-name>CharsetEncodingFilter</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern> </filter-mapping>
